page.title: 02LEISURE SURVEY
page.content: We asked 100 local people to give their view on the leisure activities in the area. This is the result of the survey. Eight per. cent. said all of thier spare time was taken up gardening, 25% regularly go swimming at Paisley or Barrhead, 12% said they used the local library often,11% are keen bowlers. The other popular pastimes mentioned are visits to the local public house, dancing and sewing classes, racing pigeons, squash, golf, badminton and fishing. The local football pitches at Moredun are also well used.However 31% of those interviewed expressed a dissatisfaction with the facilities in the area. When asked to comment many felt there should be more play areas for the children, an indoor sports centre and more outdoor tennis courts for young and old alike.
